summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6674 for the improvement of the East-West Alley in Block 6, Montlake Park Addition, being the east-west alley in the block bounded by E. Shelby St., Montlake Blvd. East, The Lake Washington Ship Canal and E. Montlake Park; and certain other street, alley and easements; by constructing underground utilities lines; under Ordinance No. 15583, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said Roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
